string.text: Get Next Orders
Dusk has pointed me towards someone who may have a job for me. Let's go see who it is.
There is a contact who is willing to pay well for our services. Go see him.
Good luck stalker.
Hunt the Stalker
Deal with the problematic stalker
Got a problematic stalker for you if your willing.
Heres your reward.
Hunt the Stalker
Deal with the troublesome stalker
Got a troublesome stalker for you if your willing.
Heres your reward.
Hunt the Stalker
Deal with the troublesome stalker
Got a troublesome stalker for you if your willing.
Thank you. Heres your reward.
Assault territory
I've been contracted to clear an area of any hostile forces present.
I need you to be the point man on an assault. Clear the target area of any and all hostile forces.
Excellent work. Here's your reward.
Assault Enemy Territory
I need to Assault Enemy Territory.
I need you to Reinforce our guys in Enemy Territory at this location. Can you do that?
Excellently done. Heres your reward.
Delivery
A Delivory job
Can you delivery this for me? It's for a friend.
Heres your reward.
Find Missing Squad
Find the Missing Squad.
We got a missing squad, think you can go find them and make sure their alive?
Heres your reward.
Find missing squad
Find the Missing Squad.
We got a missing squad, think you can go find them and make sure their alive?
Heres your reward.
Scouting Expedition
Some curious stalkers has been spotted in the area. I must deal with them before they get away.
There are reports of enemy activity in the neighbouring area, and our squad is tasked with engaging them. I'm looking for someone who is willing to scout ahead in preparation for our assault.
Excellent! Well done.
Find Important Documents
I need to find Documents for Dusk.
I need you to find some documents from this location. Can you do that?
Welcome back. Thank you, heres your reward.
Find Patches
I need to Patches for Dusk.
Heres something for you to do while we get set up here. Think of it as a fun hunting game.
Heres your goal. Goodluck.
Good job. Heres a reward.
Find a Drugkit
I need to find a Drugkit for Dave.
about
We haven't gotten all our supplies yet, think you can find a drugkit for me?
Thank you! Your a life saver.
Find a Basic Toolkit
I need to find a Basic Toolkit for Smith.
We haven't gotten all our supplies yet, think you can find a basic toolkit for me?
Thanks. We really need these tools.
Thank you! Your a life saver.
Find an Advanced Toolkit
I need to find an Advanced Toolkit for Smith.
We haven't gotten all our supplies yet, think you can find a basic toolkit for me?
Thanks. We really need these tools.
Thank you! Your a life saver.
Find an Expert Toolkit
I need to find an Expert Toolkit for Smith.
We haven't gotten all our supplies yet, think you can find a basic toolkit for me?
Thanks. We really need these tools.
Thank you! Your a life saver.

Truly entertaining... Documents about experiments on the territory of the Zone... In times of breakthrough, some of our important clients would offer fabulous sums for them. Times are different now, and it's not that we need them especially in this poor state, but the information here is still of sufficient value, hmmm... Let's do it. I'll take them now for %s RU. Deal?
That's fine. If you find the same kind of documents you should bring them, don't be shy.
